Definition.WordDefinition:
Boone \Boone\ n. Daniel Boone, a noted American frontiersman, 1734-1820.
Syn: Daniel Boone. [WordNet 1.5]
Boone n : an American pioneer and guide and explorer (1734-1820) [syn: {Daniel Boone}]
